FM of DPRK Meets Italian Delegation 
   Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with the delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Italy led by Vice-Minister Gianni Vernetti at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

DPRK Women Football Team Beats Nigerian Rival
